Hand axes ×2, silver dagger, short spear, backpack,
bandages, winter blanket, beeswax candles
×3, chalk (piece), crampons, small hammer, ink
and quill, bull’s-eye lantern, lamp oil ×2, parchment
×3, hard leather pouch, soft leather pouch,
iron rations (1 week), silk rope (50-ft.), large sack,
iron spikes ×12, tinderbox, wineskin (full), writing
stick, spell book, and 1d4+1 gold pieces.
